text: @kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump This is an out and out lie. Most of the people in this country aren’t nearly as stupid as you think we are. On a side note, we have had 2.2M cases of Coronavirus and 118K deaths, and you are willing to put the 19K that will actually fit in the arena at risk.
